name: Thai Seafood Coconut Curry Soup
author: brittneyart
summary: A delicious exotic coconut curry soup. The coconut milk adds a richness that goes well with the seafood. Serve over cellophane noodles if you desire a more substantial meal.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons fish sauce, or to taste
1 pound cooked, peeled, and deveined shrimp
8 ounces Mussel, with shell, yield after shell removed, cooked
directions: Combine fish stock, lemongrass, ginger, 1/2 of the garlic, 2 tablespoons fish sauce, and black pepper in a large soup pot
Boil over medium-low heat for 20 minutes
Meanwhile, heat sesame oil in a large saute pan over medium heat
Saute until onion is softened, about 3 minutes, taking care to not burn the garlic
Add green curry paste; saute for 1 minute
Add shrimp and mussels and saute until heated through, 2 to 3 minutes
Add seafood mixture to broth in the large pot
Simmer together for 10 minutes, then add coconut milk and sugar
Stir in lemon juice and cilantro
Taste and add more fish sauce if you desire
